mapper.select: SELECT country, bundle_id as bundle, ad_format as adFormat, ad_width as adWidth, ad_height as adHeight, SUM(imp_count) AS impCount FROM `pac_dsp_report_for_auto_explore` WHERE report_date >= #{startDate} AND report_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY country, bundle, adFormat, adWidth, adHeight HAVING impCount >= #{size}

SELECT country, bundle_id as bundle, ad_format as adFormat, ad_width as adWidth, ad_height as adHeight, SUM(win_count) / SUM(response_count) AS winRate, SUM(bid_price_total) / SUM(response_count) AS bidPrice, (SUM(win_count) / SUM(response_count)) / (SUM(bid_price_total) / SUM(response_count)) AS k FROM `pac_dsp_report` WHERE report_date = date(#{reportHour}) and report_hour = #{reportHour} GROUP BY country, bundle, adFormat, adWidth, adHeight HAVING winRate IS NOT NULL AND bidPrice IS NOT NULL

SELECT r.country as country, r.bundle_id as bundle, r.ad_format as adFormat, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(click_count) as eCPC, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(event1_count) as eCPAEvent1, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(event2_count) as eCPAEvent2, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(event3_count) as eCPAEvent3, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(event10_count) as eCPAEvent10, sum(price_total)/1000 / sum(event11_count) as eCPS FROM ads.dsp_report_fall_four r WHERE r.create_date >= #{startDate} AND r.create_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY r.country, r.bundle_id, r.ad_format

SELECT bundle_id as bundleId, ad_group_id as adGroupId, sum(imp_count) as impCount, sum(click_count) as clickCount, sum(price_total) / 1000 as cost FROM ads.dsp_report_fall_one WHERE create_date = #{createDate} GROUP BY bundle_id, ad_group_id

SELECT bundle_id as bundleId, ad_group_id as adGroupId, SUM(click_count) as clickCount, SUM(imp_count) as impCount, SUM(CASE WHEN create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} THEN price_total ELSE 0 END) as cost, SUM(CASE WHEN create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} THEN ad_estimated_commission ELSE 0 END) as adEstimatedCommission FROM ads.dsp_report_fall_one WHERE
(bundle_id = #{item.bundleId} AND ad_group_id = #{item.adGroupId})
GROUP BY ad_group_id, bundle_id

select ad_group_id as adGroupId, bundle_id as bundleId, sum(imp_count) as impCount, sum(click_count) as clickCount, SUM(price_total) / 1000 as cost from ads.dsp_report_fall_one where create_date >= #{startDate} and create_date <= #{endDate} group by ad_group_id, bundle_id
